hero.description: Discover the milestones that have shaped Cashare's journey as Switzerland's first crowdlending platform – and how we empower borrowers and investors.

sections.heading: The Power of Crowdlending: A Smarter Financing Solution
content: In 2008, Cashare launched a new lending model – simple, secure, and without banks. Our goal: fair financing under the best possible conditions for everyone involved.
As a pioneer in crowdlending, we now have the largest active 'crowd' in Switzerland and have financed more P2P loans than any other provider – with numbers continuing to grow!

Crowdlending has long since established itself as a real alternative for individuals and businesses. While banks often neglect smaller loans and offer less attractive interest rates, the FinTech sector – and Cashare with it – stands out with fair and flexible solutions. The opportunities offered by crowdlending are enormous – and they continue to expand.
Take a look at our latest key figures and see for yourself why more and more investors and borrowers are turning to crowdlending.
